@dev Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights
     resulting in insurance payouts, the contract should be self-sustaining

fund(address).details: Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights     resulting in insurance payouts, the contract should be self-sustaining

isOperational().details: isOperational check operational status of the data contract

params.airline: - address of the registered airline to which this flight belongs to
params.flightKey: - unique key that represents this flight (keccak256 hash)
params.name: - flight name
